properties.name: Epicurean Crafts
properties.description: Posted by Ladisastre305 Mill Street, Occoquan VA703-490-0777 T-F 11-4/4:30; Sat 11-5/530 Sun 11:30/5 We specialize in carrying fabric lines representing Nancy Halvorsen, Sandy Gervais, Judie Rothermel, Kathy Schmitz, 3 Sisters and Kansas Troubles. We stock a variety of stitchery (Bareroots), wearable art (Serendipity Gifts), punchneedle and quilt patterns. Also, we carry books, hand-dyed wools, quilt and rug kits. We teach quilting, rug-hooking, stitchery and punchneedle clases!

properties.name: G Street Fabrics
properties.description: Posted by Ladisastre5077 Westfields Boulevard,_Centerville, VA703-818-8090 M – S 10-9; Sun 11-6 Finest wools from Italy and England, sumptuously embroidered and beaded laces and silks from Frances and the Orient, fabulous buttons and embellishments from around the world. Extensive collection of unique cotton prints and board array of drapery and upholstery fabrics and trims.

properties.name: G Street Fabrics
properties.description: Posted by Ladisastre6250 Seven Corners Center, falls church va 22044703 241-1700. Mon-Sat 10-9:30;Sun 11-6 G Street Fabrics is the fabric store with all the answers to your quilting, apparel and home decorating needs. We have over 5,000 bolts of quilting cottons, novelty prints, vintage prints, Asian prints, batik prints, kids prints, holiday print, solids and much more. We are also one of the nation\'s top Bernina sewing machine retailers. Visit www.gstreetfabrics.com for more information and a current schedule of classes, clubs and seminars.

properties.name: Web Fabrics
properties.description: Posted by Ladisastre130 S 20th Street, Purcellville, VA703-727-4458 The home page has directions and the usual stuff needed to navigate around the site. A very friendly group of ladies working in the shop. Shop hours are listed on the web page. Certainly worthy of a trip there. They try to have a complete line of whatever they carry. There is a great restaurant nearby as well called Magnolia\'s. An enjoyable trip to the "country".
